EmailTemplate.name: Email Project.TP Access Request - Aircraft Info
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Tech Pubs Request is Missing Information {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tech Pubs Access Request
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting the Honeywell Aerospace Technical Publications Team. We’ve received your {!Case.Subject} inquiry, and are anxious to get right to work on it.
But before we can start, we need your help. We need just a bit more information that was missing from your request. Aircraft Serial Number and/or Registration Number
If you recently purchased the aircraft, please provide the finalized bill of sale. Or if you’re a new operator, please provide us the Operator Agreement.
Just reply to this email and include your missing information. To track our progress on your request, use this unique tracking number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. For Case Related Questions?
We’ll connect all of your inquiry details through the subject line of this email. So, when you reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
We’ll be on the lookout for your email.
Thanks again! We appreciate your business, {!Case.OwnerFirstName} Honeywell Aerospace Technical Publications Team Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/ZIZ4X06jG0000H0bl20qXQn]]> 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099 ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c} This e-mail message and any attachment(s) are for the use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain proprietary and/or confidential information, which may be privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure. Further, information contained herein, U.S. Export Control laws may control including attached files. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure or distribution of this communication in whole or in part without the express written consent of Honeywell, or the U.S. Government as required, is prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient(s), please contact the sender by reply email and destroy the original message and any copies of the message as well as any attachment(s) to the original message.
